title: What were the Monte-Carlo Masters results?
description: Play continued on Wednesday at the Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters, the first clay-court ATP Masters 1000 event of the 2025 season. Carlos Alcaraz headlined the winners, while Alejandro Tabilo stunned Novak Djokovic. View all of the Monte-Carlo tennis results below. Monte-Carlo

View all results from Wednesday in Monte-Carlo

April 09, 2025

Corinne Dubreuil/ATP Tour

The Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters is the first clay-court ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff

Play continued on Wednesday at the Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters, the first clay-court ATP Masters 1000 event of the 2025 season. Carlos Alcaraz headlined the winners, while Alejandro Tabilo stunned Novak Djokovic.

View all of the Monte-Carlo tennis results below.

You May Also Like: What is the Monte-Carlo Masters schedule?

Results - Wednesday, 9 April 2025

Men's Singles - Round of 32
[Q] Daniel Altmaier (GER) d [WC] Richard Gasquet (FRA) 75 57 62
[2] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) d Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) 36 60 61
Alejandro Tabilo (CHI) d [3] Novak Djokovic (SRB) 63 64
[9] Daniil Medvedev d Alexandre Muller (FRA) 76(6) 57 62
[13] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) d Jiri Lehecka (CZE) 16 75 62
[7] Andrey Rublev d Gael Monfils (FRA) 64 76(2)
[4] Casper Ruud (NOR) d Roberto Bautista Agut (ESP) 62 61
[15] Grigor Dimitrov (BUL) d [WC] Valentin Vacherot (MON) 46 63 61
Alejandro Davidovich Fokina (ESP) d Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG) 76(2) 63
[12] Arthur Fils (FRA) d Flavio Cobolli (ITA) 62 64
[8] Alex de Minaur (AUS) d Tomas Machac (CZE) 36 60 63
Nuno Borges (POR) d Pedro Martinez (ESP) 75 67(4) 64
Alexei Popyrin (AUS) d [14] Frances Tiafoe (USA) 36 63 63

Men's Doubles - Round of 28

[7] Julian Cash (GBR)/Lloyd Glasspool (GBR) d [WC] Petros Tsitsipas (GRE)/Stefanos Tsitsipas (GRE) 61 76(5)
